summary: Deployment success and live site checklist for https://cofred.netlify.app/
assistant_output: Confirmed the site is live and accessible. Here's the checklist to verify functionality and prepare for future updates.
outcomes: Confirmed session links and homepage functionality.
Provided steps for future updates and enhancements.

checklist.details: Ensure the homepage displays the session links correctly.
Click each session link to confirm the session pages load as expected.
Verify any dynamically generated content, like new sessions, updates properly.
Ensure styling (CSS) and all assets (images, fonts, etc.) load correctly.
Run 'node script.js' locally to generate new sessions and redeploy the updated dist folder.
